decl.description:
`furo-ui5-select-labeled`
The furo-ui5-select-labeled is a composition to easily use a complete data select with label according
to the design specification of SAP Fiori Design System.
decl.name: FuroUi5SelectLabeled

slots.description: defines the value state message that will be displayed as pop up under the input element.
slots.name: valueStateMessage

members.name: focus
members.description: Focuses the underlying ui5 input element

members.name: _FBPReady
members.description: flow is ready lifecycle method

members.name: bindData
members.description: Orchestrates the data field connection to the inside

members.name: bindOptions
members.description: Binds a repeaterNode to the furo-ui5-select component

members.name: label
members.description: the label for the data-number-input

members.name: idFieldPath
members.description:
Defines the field path that is used from the injected RepeaterNode to identify the option items.
Point-separated path to the field
E.g. data.partner.ulid

members.name: valueFieldPath
members.description:
Defines the field path that is used to update the bound component if the user has selected an option.
Point-separated path to the field
Must be set if a data binding is specified.

members.name: displayFieldPath
members.description:
Defines the field path that is used from the injected RepeaterNode to display the option items.
Point-separated path to the field
E.g. data.partner.display_name

members.name: required
members.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is required and marked with *.

members.name: disabled
members.description:
A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field cannot be edited by the user and
appears in disabled state.

members.name: readonly
members.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is readonly.

events.description: Fires the field value when it changes.
events.name: value-changed

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is required and marked with *.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field cannot be edited by the user and
appears in disabled state.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is readonly.

attributes.name: id-field-path
attributes.description:
Defines the field path that is used from the injected RepeaterNode to identify the option items.
Point-separated path to the field
E.g. data.partner.ulid

attributes.name: display-field-path
attributes.description:
Defines the field path that is used from the injected RepeaterNode to display the option items.
Point-separated path to the field
E.g. data.partner.display_name

attributes.name: value-field-path
attributes.description:
Defines the field path that is used to update the bound component if the user has selected an option.
Point-separated path to the field
Must be set if a data binding is specified.

pkg.name: @furo/ui5
pkg.description: SAP UI5 Web Components data bindings for furo

scripts.docs:generate: npm run analyze:components && npm run analyze:typerenderer && ./scripts/cem.sh
